about_the_game:
Get all "balanced" animals of the Banana Drama universe! The DLC includes three animals for the price of only two:

- The giraffe (balanced)
- The tiger (balanced)
- The alpaca (balanced)

With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama. Thank you very much!

All included animal descriptions:

- Helicopter giraffe! Get the incredibly excited Banana Drama giraffe with this DLC. She has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama animals ("balanced" type). Sometimes she gets so excited that she can't stop spinning her head like a helicopter. Let's hope she doesn't fly away!

- Wow a tiger! Get the incredibly cute and sleepy Banana Drama tiger with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama animals ("balanced" type). He is particularly proud of his beautiful coat and regularly impresses many female tigers with it.

- Alpapaca! Get the incredibly fluffy Banana Drama alpaca with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama aimals ("balanced" type). Unfortunately, he is allergic to bananas and therefore often sneezes - he would like to point out that his sneezing is often mistaken for spitting. Please keep this in mind.
